viper.title: Razer Viper V3 Pro: features and price of this new eSports mouse
viper.description: Razer has just launched a new gaming mouse that incorporates high-performance features, in addition to being very lightweight and featuring the latest technology to provide a professional gaming experience. It's the Razer Viper V3 Pro, the successor to one of the world's best wireless mice for eSports.
viper.author: Antonio Ferrer
paragraphs: The Viper V3 Pro is now available in white and black colors, at a recommended price of 179.99 euros. It can be purchased on the Razer website, PcComponentes, and other authorized stores. We are talking about a high-end mouse that positions itself as one of the best options for the most demanding players.

This mouse is equipped with a Focus Pro 35K Gen 2 optical sensor, which provides remarkable precision, with a resolution accuracy of 99.8%. Additionally, it can be adjusted with variations of 1 DPI, allowing you to adapt the sensitivity of the Razer Viper V3 Pro to the needs of each player.

As an additional feature to improve performance, the Viper V3 Pro includes the HyperPolling Wireless Dongle, with a higher polling rate, reaching up to 8,000 Hz. This feature provides minimal latency response, synchronizing each movement and click with actions on the screen, even in highly competitive environments.

Focusing on the input provided by professional players, the Razer Viper V3 Pro has been redesigned to reach a weight of only 54 grams. Additionally, the side buttons are spaced apart to prevent accidental clicks and it features a button to change sensitivity.

In its aim to balance battery life without affecting the gaming experience, the Razer Viper V3 Pro is capable of automatically adjusting the polling rate, provided we activate this function. This adjustment makes it possible for the battery to last up to 95 hours on a single charge. Regarding the 3rd generation Razer optical switches, they have a lifespan of 90 million clicks.
